movies.title: Park Benches
movies.plot: We follow the everyday lives of Parisians living in the wealthy suburb of Versailles.
movies.simplePlot: We follow the everyday lives of Parisians living in the wealthy suburb of Versailles.

biography.bio: Florence Muller is an actress, known for Paris, je t'aime (2006), The Family (2013) and Park Benches (2009).
biography.name: Florence Muller

biography.bio: Ridan is an actor and composer, known for Park Benches (2009), 600 euros (2016) and Ce soir (ou jamais!) (2006).
biography.name: Ridan

biography.bio: Jérôme Paret is an actor, known for Park Benches (2009).
biography.name: Jérôme Paret

biography.bio: Denis Podalydès was born on April 22, 1963 in Versailles, France. He is an actor and writer, known for The Da Vinci Code (2006), Caché (2005) and La journée de la jupe (2008).
biography.name: Denis Podalydès

biography.bio: Samir Guesmi was born on October 7, 1967 in Paris, France. He is an actor and director, known for District B13 (2004), Tell No One (2006) and Camille redouble (2012).
biography.name: Samir Guesmi

biography.bio: Bruno Podalydès was born on March 11, 1961 in Boulogne-Billancourt, Hauts-de-Seine, France. He is an actor and director, known for Paris, je t'aime (2006), Comme un avion (2015) and Le parfum de la dame en noir (2005).
biography.name: Bruno Podalydès

biography.bio: Laure Calamy is an actress, known for A Perfect Plan (2012), 9 mois ferme (2013) and Victoria (2016).
biography.name: Laure Calamy

biography.bio: Estelle Chailloux is known for her work on One Day (2011), Paris, je t'aime (2006) and The Love Punch (2013).
biography.name: Estelle Chailloux

biography.bio: Grandson of a carpenter, Olivier Gourmet grew up in Mirwart, a Belgian village where his father was a cattle dealer and mother the manager of a family hotel-restaurant. At 13, he was sent to boarding school, which was an unhappy experience that led him to "be closed in on myself". It was at this school that he began acting when he replaced a classmate at short notice in the school play. He discovered a talent for mimicry and comedy. Later he was torn between a career in sports journalism or comedy. He opted for acting and comedy and attended the Conservatoire de Liège where he won first prize after only two years. In 1996 he enjoyed his first significant role in a Dardenne brothers' film, The Promise. Since then Gourmet has featured in every film from the Dardennes. His performance in their film The Son earned him a Cannes Jury prize for interpretation in 2002. He is a much sought after actor with an extensive filmography making, on average five films per year. Internationally regarded as the one of greatest actors with staggering performances in a wide range of roles full of charismatic qualities and insights, he has also received the Critics Award at the Cannes festival in 2011 and in 2012 he was nominated in eleven categories at the Césars! Olivier has been married to Catherine since age 19 and they have two children, Louis and Juliette. After his mother suffered a stroke, the family returned to Mirwart to manage the hotel-restaurant with Olivier's wife leaving her advertising career.
biography.name: Olivier Gourmet

biography.bio: Robin Londinsky is an actress, known for Park Benches (2009).
biography.name: Robin Londinsky

biography.bio: Patrick Ligardes is an actor and writer, known for Hitman (2007), Frontier(s) (2007) and Welcome (2009).
biography.name: Patrick Ligardes

biography.bio: Pierre Guinot Déléry is an actor, known for Park Benches (2009).
biography.name: Pierre Guinot Déléry

biography.bio: Chantal Lauby was born on March 23, 1948 in Gap, Hautes-Alpes, France. She is an actress and writer, known for Qu'est-ce qu'on a fait au Bon Dieu? (2014), La cité de la peur (1994) and La cage dorée (2013).
biography.name: Chantal Lauby

biography.bio: Emeline Bayart is an actress, known for Populaire (2012), A Perfect Plan (2012) and Catharsis (2011).
biography.name: Emeline Bayart

biography.bio: Hippolyte Girardot was born on October 10, 1955 in Boulogne-Billancourt, Hauts-de-Seine, France as Frédéric Girardot. He is an actor and director, known for Manon of the Spring (1986), Lady Chatterley (2006) and Paris, je t'aime (2006).
biography.name: Hippolyte Girardot

filmingLocations.location: Rue de Noailles, Versailles, Yvelines, France
